00040 bool GameObj3d::Init(NiNodePtr attachToThis)
00041 {
00042         // get a 3d model from the ResourceManager depending on the
00043         // object's type
00044     m_spNode = ResourceManager::Get()->GetNode(m_Type);
00045         if (m_spNode)
00046         {
00047                 // attach the model to the scene graph
00048                 attachToThis->AttachChild(m_spNode);
00049                 // do any extra inits (virtual)
00050                 return DoExtraInits();
00051         }
00052         
00053         return false;
00054 }
00055 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00064 bool GameObj3d::Init(NiNodePtr attachToThis, NiPhysXScenePtr attachToScene)
00065 {
00066         // get a 3d model and a PhysX prop from the ResourceManager
00067         // depending on the object's type
00068         NiNodePropPtr nodeProp = ResourceManager::Get()->GetNodeProp(m_Type);
00069         if (nodeProp)
00070         {
00071                 // attach the model to the scene graph
00072                 attachToThis->AttachChild(nodeProp->m_spNode);
00073                 // attach the PhysX prop to the main PhysX scene
00074                 attachToScene->AddProp(nodeProp->m_spProp);
00075 
00076                 m_spNode = nodeProp->m_spNode;
00077                 m_spProp = nodeProp->m_spProp;
00078 
00079                 // do extra initializations
00080                 return DoExtraInits();
00081         }
00082         return false;
00083 }
00084 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00090 void GameObj3d::Update(float fTime)
00091 {
00092         DoExtraUpdates(fTime);
00093         if (m_spNode)
00094         {
00095                 m_spNode->UpdateProperties();
00096                 m_spNode->UpdateEffects();
00097                 m_spNode->Update(fTime);
00098         }
00099 }

00106 void GameObj3d::SetEmmitance(const NiColor& color)
00107 {
00108         SetEmmitanceForNode(m_spNode, color);
00109 }
00110 //---------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00118 void GameObj3d::SetEmmitanceForNode(NiAVObject* n, const NiColor& color)
00119 {
00120         // traverse the object's node and change the emmisive color
00121         NiNodePtr node = 0;
00122         NiGeometryPtr geom = 0;
00123         if (NiIsKindOf(NiNode, n))
00124         {
00125                 node = (NiNode*)n;
00126                 NiMaterialPropertyPtr mat = (NiMaterialProperty*)node->GetProperty(NiProperty::MATERIAL);
00127                 if (mat)
00128                         mat->NiMaterialProperty::SetEmittance(color);
00129                 for (int i=0; i<node->GetChildCount(); i++)
00130                 {
00131                         SetEmmitanceForNode(node->GetAt(i), color);
00132                 }
00133         }
00134         else if (NiIsKindOf(NiGeometry, n))
00135         {
00136                 geom = (NiGeometry*)n;
00137                 NiMaterialPropertyPtr mat = (NiMaterialProperty*)geom->GetProperty(NiProperty::MATERIAL);
00138                 if (mat)
00139                         mat->NiMaterialProperty::SetEmittance(color);
00140         }
00141 }
